title: Fantacia
description: Fantacia.As the news of Earth's impending doom is heard, Fantacia, Orion & Shadow depart for a new life.Little do they realise, there is more to their lives than they could ever guess. They are Voxian! An alien species with mega super powers. Beautiful people who fight for good, have Angel blood & fight with swords to protect those weaker.This is a dark fantasy novel with large amounts of violence and bad language compared to other stories in the past such as 'Clash of the Titans' & Game of Thrones.'
author: Ruth Watson-Morris
